email.title: Graduate Roles at Liquidnet
email.sponsor:
**2 GRADUATE POSITIONS AVAILABLE AT LIQUIDNET**
Liquidnet are looking for graduates to fill their remaining Data Scientist / Quant Dev positions!
Liquidnet are a technology-driven, global institutional investment network that intelligently connects the world’s investors to the world’s investments. Since their founding in 1999, their network has grown to include more than 1,000 institutional investors that collectively manage $33 trillion in equity and fixed income assets.
What you’ll tackle:
- Analyse unique proprietary datasets - Create, evaluate, and enhance mathematical models and streaming analytics pipelines - Write clean production code to integrate those models into client facing products - Partner globally with other data scientists, quants, developers, product designers, clients and industry leaders to deliver creative solutions to the important problems faced by the world’s largest asset managers
For more information, visit this link: https://liquidnet.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/Liquidnet/job/London/Data-Scientist---Quant-Dev---Graduate-Role_R-00561
